column1: So Syfy’s THE WIL WHEATON PROJECT is E’s THE SOUP, but more geek-focused?
Syfy’s The Wil Wheaton Project is considerably more mean-spirited than I’d anticipated or hoped for.
Syfy moved THE WIL WHEATON PROJECT up to 9pm, and HEROES OF COSPLAY back to 10pm?!
Have you guys seen The Wil Wheaton Project yet?
He’s freaking hilarious! Everyone should watch that show.
So i was about to post about felcia day being on The Wil Wheaton Project, when suddenly Castiel and Dean show up out of nowhere and make my day
